name: grid-overlay
description: Visual grid overlay for aligning CSS layouts at development-time.

scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run scripts && npm run scripts-vue
scripts.scripts: node ./node_modules/browserify/bin/cmd.js -s GridOverlay src/grid-overlay.js -do dist/grid-overlay.js && node ./node_modules/uglify-js/bin/uglifyjs -c -o dist/grid-overlay.min.js dist/grid-overlay.js
scripts.scripts-vue: node ./node_modules/browserify/bin/cmd.js -s GridOverlayVue src/grid-overlay-vue.js -do dist/grid-overlay-vue.js && node ./node_modules/uglify-js/bin/uglifyjs -c -o dist/grid-overlay-vue.min.js dist/grid-overlay-vue.js

author: Mjr
